required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment for Migraines With an Implantable Device
clinical_study.official_title: Precision Implantable Stimulator for Migraine (PRISM) Study- Occipital Nerve Stimulation (ONS) for Migraine

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of an implantable device for difficult to treat migraine. There are a significant number of patients who have drug refractory migraine and alternative therapies are needed.

primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in migraine days/month at 12 weeks
Cumulative frequency of adverse events from randomization to 26 weeks

arm_group.description: Sham occipital nerve stimulation from activation to 12 weeks post-activation. Active occipital nerve stimulation from 12 weeks post-activation on.

facility.name: The New England Center for Headache
Albert Einstein College of Medicine - Montefiore Headache Unit

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: 179 subjects signed consent, 39 subjects screen failed, and 140 eligible subjects were randomized (1 subject was later excluded).

group.title: Treatment
group.description: Active occipital nerve stimulation (stimulation on). Precision: Implantable neurostimulator

group.title: Control
group.description: Sham occipital nerve stimulation from activation to 12 weeks post-activation. Active occipital nerve stimulation from 12 weeks post-activation on.

baseline.population: 1 subject excluded from analysis because HIPAA authorization was not obtained; randomized to active group, received percutaneous trial only

group.title: Control
group.description: Sham Stimulation up to 12 weeks post-activation. Actual Stimulation from 12 weeks post-activation on. Precision: Implantable neurostimulator

outcome.title: Migraine Frequency at 12 Weeks
outcome.description: Change from baseline in migraine days/month at 12 weeks

group.title: Control
group.description: Sham Stimulation up to 12 weeks post-activation. Actual Stimulation from 12 weeks post-activation on. Precision: Implantable neurostimulator

measure.title: Migraine Frequency at 12 Weeks
measure.description: Change from baseline in migraine days/month at 12 weeks

outcome.title: Frequency of Adverse Event
outcome.description: Cumulative frequency of adverse events from randomization to 26 weeks

group.title: Control
group.description: Sham Stimulation up to 12 weeks post-activation. Actual Stimulation from 12 weeks post-activation on. Precision: Implantable neurostimulator

measure.title: Frequency of Adverse Event
measure.description: Cumulative frequency of adverse events from randomization to 26 weeks

reported_events.time_frame: Safety data was collected through the 12 year follow up visit.

group.title: Treatment
group.description: Active occipital nerve stimulation (stimulation on) Precision: Implantable neurostimulator

group.title: Control
group.description: Sham occipital nerve stimulation from activation to 12 weeks post-activation. Active occipital nerve stimulation from 12 weeks post-activation on. Precision: Implantable neurostimulator

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
